author: cmpilato
msg: Begin the work of separating the internal filesystem structures from
the list/string skeleton library routines.  This is a requirement for
pluggable database backends, and will (I think) assist in the
conversion to the new NodeId interface.
- Structure definition for nearly all (if not all) of the current FS types.
- Move (or remove) much of the cruft in validate.[ch].
- Since we actually store PROPLIST skels at data (entries lists),
typedef apr_hash_t * proplist and document that any users of this
type expect const char * property names and svn_string_t * property values.
(Representations): Update the BNF to reflect The Real World (and to
be consistent with other sections of this document.
(svn_fs__get_rev, svn_fs__put_rev): Upgrade to a new skel-free interface.
(svn_fs__get_rev, svn_fs__put_rev): Upgrade to a new skel-free interface.
(txn_body_dag_init_fs): Update calls to svn_fs__put_rev and svn_fs__get_txn.
(put_txn, svn_fs__get_txn): Upgrade to new skel-free interface.
(make_fulltext_rep): Was make_fulltext_rep_skel.  Upgrade to the new
svn_fs__rep_contents_size): Upgrade to the new skel-free interface.
svn_fs__rep_undeltify): Updated calls to interfaces (no more skels,
(svn_fs__string_copy): Copy original key in case call is sharing
storage between old and new keys.
(write_new_rep, write_rep, read_rep, delete_rep): Fix tests to use
valid-looking representations, since some semblance of validation
Renamed 'rep' parameters to 'rep_key' throughout, and removed the
docstring that stated that such a thing wouldn't be done.
Add fs_skels.c and fs_skels.h to the Windows build.

author: striker
msg: Get us building on windows again...

author: cmpilato
msg: (close_file): Check for conflicts and merges even when the file is a
new addition, since we don't know for sure that it really *is*
new -- we're only a trace editor!

author: kfogel
msg: Fix a lot of "%ld" format strings (revision 1836 only took care of "%lu").
Thanks to Philip Martin for noticing.
(SVN_REVNUM_T_FMT): Revnums are long int, not unsigned long.
* Everywhere, and I do mean everywhere: Use SVN_REVNUM_T_FMT,
APR_SIZE_T_FMT, APR_OFF_T_FMT, and APR_SSIZE_T_FMT as necessary.
If there are any other format code problems, don't tell me.  My editor
and I are off to the Bahamas for some R & R.

author: cmpilato
msg: (delta_files): Rework the logic in this function to only call
send_text_deltas if there are deltas to send, and within that case,
only use a real delta stream if the caller wants real text deltas.
